backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining chat logic, user profiles, media storage, emojis, and authorization mixins with join and profile update functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding‑related deployment verification files, components, and test references for Version 33.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT-BRANDING-CHECKLIST.m: Deployment checklist ensuring correct branding assets and HTML title for Version 33 before release.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file setting title “Dini GC” and linking favicon and apple‑touch‑icon assets.
Node script verifying index.html branding title and icon paths and ensuring required asset files exist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that loads or stores user profile in sessionStorage and switches between JoinScreen and ChatScreen.
frontend/src/components/ChatScreen.tsx: Main chat UI handling messages, media uploads, profile editing, GIFs, emojis, and auto‑scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Component for browsing and selecting custom emojis and uploading new emoji images with validation and server mutation.
frontend/src/components/GifPicker.tsx: GIF picker that loads trending or searched GIPHY results and lets users select a GIF URL.
frontend/src/components/JoinScreen.tsx: User onboarding screen handling username entry, optional profile picture upload, and user creation via backend.
frontend/src/components/MessageItem.tsx: Renders a chat message with avatar, timestamp, text, emojis, and media, adjusting layout for own vs others’ messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching messages, counts, default pictures, and for sending messages and uploading media via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and a light‑mode theme using OKLCH variables with a custom font.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports app config including GIPHY API key, endpoints, and default query params.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, issues, and branding/deployment tasks for the Dini GC project.
